isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL FENDERS

svcprocinfo.para: The fenders on the 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA) and 5500 i (SFA), 5600 i (SBA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood are part of the hood assembly and are not able to be removed or installed.

svcsubproc.title: Install Fenders on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood

note.para: Each fender may be removed and installed separately.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position the front of the fender (Item 1, Figure 50) and splash panel (Item 2, Figure 50) together. Install two hex bolts (Item 4) through the splash panel (Item 3) and fender reinforcement (Item 5) and install flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4). Tighten finger tight.

Install two hex bolts (Item 1) through the fender (Item 2) and splash panel (Item 3) at the front flange of the fender and splash panel assembly and from the splash panel side, install flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 1). Tighten finger tight.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Also install four hex bolts (Item 5) through the top flange of the fender (Item 1) and splash panel assembly (Item 2) and from the splash panel side, install flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 5). Tighten finger tight.

Position rear fender channel (Item 3) in place under the fender and splash panel (Items 1 and 2) and install the five hex bolts (Item 4), three through the top of the fender, splash panel and rear fender channel and two through the splash panel and rear fender channel, then from under the fender, install flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4) and tighten.
Tighten hex bolts and hex lock nuts (Item 5, Figure 48) and (Items 1 and 4, Figure 49) securing the fender and splash panel and fender reinforcement together.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 46 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position the fender support angle (Item 8) on the front of the fender (Item 9), on top of the fender support bracket (Item 7).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 47 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the fender (Item 3), splash panel assembly (Item 6) and mud flap assembly (Item 5) in place at the rear fender support (Item 4). Install three flange hex bolts (Item 1) from outside the fender through the rear fender support (Item 4), fender (Item 3) and mud flap assembly (Item 5). Install three flange hex lock nuts (Item 2) from inside the fender and tighten.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 46 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Install three hex bolts (Item 1) with flat washers (Item 3, View A - A) through the fender support angle (Item 8, View A - A), rubber spacer (Item 4, View A - A), positioned between the fender support angle and fender support bracket (Item 7, View A - A), then install from under the fender support bracket the springs (Item 5, View A - A), hardened flat washers (Item 6, View A - A) and hex lock nuts (Item 2, View A - A), three places. Tighten the three hex bolts and hex lock nuts (Items 1 and 2, View A - A) until the lock nut bottoms out against the end of the threads of the bolt.
Connect headlight and directional light wiring to fender assembly being installed.
Lower the left (driver) side hood panel and latch the hood latches.
Repeat this procedure to assemble and install the right (passenger) side fender and splash panel assembly.
